# finalizeAndFinishThroughEndOfInput()

**Instance Method**

Finishes analysis after an audio input sequence has been fully consumed and its results are finalized.

## Declaration

```swift
final func finalizeAndFinishThroughEndOfInput() async throws
```

## Discussion

This method waits until the input sequence has terminated, then finalizes like [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SpeechAnalyzer/finalize(through:)] and finishes analysis like [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SpeechAnalyzer/finish(after:)].

If the input sequence is replaced using one of the `start` methods, this method continues waiting for the replacement input sequence to terminate.



## Finishing analysis

- **cancelAndFinishNow()**: Finishes analysis immediately.
- **finalizeAndFinish(through:)**: Finishes analysis after finalizing results for a given time-code.
- **finish(after:)**: Finishes analysis once input for a given time is consumed.
